formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Information on CPS Procedures & Challenges for Alex Thompson Inquiry

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. Alex Thompson—the investigative journalist we discussed—is drafting a piece on child-protective services and has asked for an overview of Haven’s procedures and current challenges. I’m preparing a response on the agency’s behalf and would appreciate your insight.

Could you please:

• Point me to, or share, the relevant Notion pages that outline our intake, assessment, case-planning, and follow-up protocols.  
• Flag any recent policy updates, pilot programs, or data points that would be useful to highlight.  
• Summarize the top two or three operational challenges we’re currently facing (staffing, caseloads, technology, etc.) that are suitable for public discussion.  
• Note anything that should remain off-the-record or requires leadership approval before release.

If you could get this to me by [desired date/time], I can ensure Alex receives an accurate, well-rounded response.

Thank you so much for your help, Jane. Let me know if you have any questions.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
